project.name: J-C088A-CMUD-09-ST03-DT02-DF18-CF03-01
project.description: This test takes in data from an argument, that is intended to contain parameters for an 'find' command. The test does not perform checks on the parameters, however, and it is possible to include other, unexpected commands as part of the find parameter set.

iopair.name: J-C088A-CMUD-09-ST03-DT02-DF18-CF03-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: register a character, become an archon (essentially a superuser), destroy character Environment variable defining test value.

process.script: dd if=/dev/urandom count=1 bs=512 2> /dev/null | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' | fold -w 5 | head -1 >/tmp/screen_name.txt; cat /tmp/screen_name.txt

sleep 22 && screen -dmSL ${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']} "$SS_TC_DEPS/bin/tt++" "$SS_TC_ROOT/testData/good-01/good_01.tin"; while [[ `screen -ls` == *${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']}* ]]; do sleep 1; done;

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="test_file01" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887
kill $(ps aux | grep 'coffee_mud' | grep -v 'grep' | awk '{print $2}'); echo "Killed coffee_mud"; date

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01-01 AND GOOD-01-02 AND GOOD-01-03 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="$(echo IioiOyBlY2hvIEhlbGxvIFdvcmxk | base64 --decode)" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887
